title: How to connect my Raspberry Pi 4 to WIFI - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, here is the best method to connect Raspberry pi 4 to WIFI >>To tell the Raspberry Pi to automatically connect to your WiFi network you need to edit a file called: wpa_supplicant. conf. Remember to replace this with your own network name and password. Save and close the file by pressing Ctrl+X followed by Y. Follow the Link more about Uses Raspberry Pi can be read here with details

You can use a keyboard and mouse to simply click the wifi drop down and select your wifi network. If you don’t have a keyboard in mouse you can add a config file to the micro sd card so when it’s powered on it will automatically connect to wifi. This tutorial runs through the entire process.
